name: Curse Of The Pyramid
description:
Curse Of The Pyramid is a single-player hack and slash, dungeon crawler, bullet hell roguelike with a unique twist: Soul Mode.
In Soul Mode you play as the soul version of yourself, not only having access to a different ability set but also you are able to interact with special gameplay elements. As the enemies are making also use of this system, you have to make quick decisions in your fighting style to make it out of every room alive. 

Will you be able to break the Curse of the Pyramid and will you solve all its mysteries?

Developed by
Steven Serra Mock (Director, Main Game Design, LookDev, Tech Art,  Character, VFX, SFX, Soundtrack-Composition)
Silke Van Der Smissen (Environment, Prop, LookDev, Tech Art, Lighting)
Bente Schoone (Character, Rigging, Animation, UI, Prop, Cinematography)
Judith Verdonck (Gameplay, AI, Optimization)
Enrique Brosse (Back-end, Tool, Optimization)
